text:
This place for Mala Hot Pot is great. The vegetable Mala is worth the price. The spiciness needs to be increased for the spicy condition, they add more of normal dry chillies.
This is located in Level 4 inside the kopitiam.

mala hotpot is really yummy and well cooked and flavoured but spicy level is like a level lesser spicier than what it should be
Bland and in fact rather gross tasting mala.
